title: World
description: Manage the regions and locations of your world

empty_state.title: No regions created
empty_state.description: Start by creating your first region to build your world

scale_descriptions.local: Cities, towns, forests, mountains, smaller regions
scale_descriptions.continental: Continents, large regions, countries, extensive territories

create_region.title: Create New Region
create_region.warning: Everything can be edited later. Some special sections can only be added after creating the region.
create_region.climate_placeholder: Temperate with rainy winters and dry summers
create_region.general_description_placeholder: The forests are filled with ancient oaks and mystical creatures. Crystal-clear rivers flow through valleys where rare herbs grow. The region is known for its abundant wildlife and magical flora.
create_region.anomaly_placeholder: Rivers that flow upward defying gravity
create_region.resident_factions_placeholder: Select factions residing in this region
create_region.races_found_placeholder: Select races found in this region
create_region.items_found_placeholder: Select items found in this region
create_region.no_factions_warning: No factions registered. Go to the Factions tab to create one.
create_region.no_characters_warning: No characters registered. Go to the Characters tab to create one.
create_region.no_races_warning: No races registered. Go to the Races tab to create one.
create_region.no_items_warning: No items registered. Go to the Items tab to create one.
create_region.narrative_purpose_placeholder: Serves as the starting point for the hero's journey and the place where the ancient prophecy is revealed
create_region.unique_characteristics_placeholder: The constant sound of bells echoing through the valleys. The sweet aroma of moonflowers at dusk. A perpetual mist that never fully dissipates.
create_region.political_importance_placeholder: Neutral territory serving as meeting ground for the five great kingdoms. Home to the Grand Council that mediates continental conflicts.
create_region.religious_importance_placeholder: Sacred birthplace of the three ancient gods. Pilgrimage destination for followers of the Light seeking spiritual enlightenment.
create_region.world_perception_label: How It's Seen by the Rest of the World
create_region.world_perception_placeholder: Viewed with respect and reverence by most nations. Some see it as outdated and resistant to progress. The common folk consider it a place of miracles and hope.
create_region.mystery_placeholder: Dancing ghosts regularly seen on full moon nights

hierarchy_manager.title: Manage Region Hierarchy
hierarchy_manager.description: Reorganize regions by dragging and dropping. You can move regions between different parents or make them neutral.
